hero.introText: I'm Alejandro Romero Stankevich, a junior web developer currently living in Katowice, Poland, as part of the Erasmus+ program. I'm studying a Higher Degree in Web Development and actively looking for internship or job opportunities, preferably remote or based in Warsaw.

exp.description: I created a modern, responsive website concept for MMBQ â€” a fictional mobile virtual network operator targeting young and active users. The project includes light/dark themes, full internationalization (English and Spanish), and was built using Astro, TailwindCSS, and some Vue.js. This helped me improve my frontend workflow and focus on real-world UX design.
exp.description1: In September, I began a Higher Degree in Web Development at a school in Catalonia. The course lasts two years, and Iâ€™m already looking for work or internships.
exp.description2: On GitHub, you can see all my updates and almost my entire learning journey, including my contributions and how my skills have evolved over time.

Iâ€™m improving my skills using Astro, TailwindCSS, HTML, and CSS. I'm also learning JavaScript, Vue.js, and have basic experience with React. aboutMe.extra: I consider myself proactive, with strong teamwork skills, initiative, and a strong desire to continue learning and growing professionally. ðŸš€

contact.intro: I'm currently living in Poland through the Erasmus+ program and creating small web projects to improve my skills in Astro, TailwindCSS, HTML, CSS, and Vue.js. I'm looking for an opportunity to work and grow as a developer within a dynamic team. If I find the right opportunity, I would love to stay and continue living in Poland.
